alert.note: Alert for Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:07PM CDT until June 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR MCPHERSON...NORTHEASTERN RENO...EASTERN RICE AND WESTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 1106 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Inman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, South Hutchinson, Moundridge, Inman, Nickerson, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Goessel, Lehigh, Windom, Willowbrook, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury and Hutchinson Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
